message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CL (Computation and Language) - The paper focuses on learning visually grounded word embeddings, which is a task related to natural language processing and understanding. 
2. cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) - The paper uses abstract scenes created from clipart to provide visual grounding, which is a task related to computer vision. 
3. cs.LG (Machine Learning) - The paper proposes a model to learn visually grounded word embeddings, which is a task related to machine learning. 
4. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) - The paper proposes a model to capture visual notions of semantic relatedness, which is a task related to artificial intelligence. 
5. cs.IR (Information Retrieval) - The paper shows improvements over text-only word embeddings on text-based image retrieval, which is a task related to information retrieval.
